attributes.name: model-value
attributes.desc: Should Drawer be displayed

attributes.name: v-model
attributes.desc: Should Drawer be displayed

attributes.name: append-to-body
attributes.desc: Controls should Drawer be inserted to DocumentBody Element, nested Drawer must assign this param to **true**

attributes.name: append-to
attributes.desc: which element the Drawer appends to. Will override append-to-body(2.8.0)

attributes.name: lock-scroll
attributes.desc: whether scroll of body is disabled while Drawer is displayed

attributes.name: before-close
attributes.desc: If set, closing procedure will be halted
attributes.optionValue: (done: (cancel?: boolean) => void) => void(done is function type that accepts a boolean as parameter, calling done with true or without parameter will abort the close procedure)

attributes.name: close-on-click-modal
attributes.desc: whether the Drawer can be closed by clicking the mask

attributes.name: close-on-press-escape
attributes.desc: Indicates whether Drawer can be closed by pressing ESC

attributes.name: open-delay
attributes.desc: Time(milliseconds) before open

attributes.name: close-delay
attributes.desc: Time(milliseconds) before close

attributes.name: destroy-on-close
attributes.desc: Indicates whether children should be destroyed after Drawer closed

attributes.name: modal
attributes.desc: Should show shadowing layer

attributes.name: direction
attributes.desc: Drawer's opening direction

attributes.name: show-close
attributes.desc: Should show close button at the top right of Drawer

attributes.name: size
attributes.desc: Drawer's size, if Drawer is horizontal mode, it effects the width property, otherwise it effects the height property, when size is number type, it describes the size by unit of pixels; when size is string type, it should be used with x% notation, other wise it will be interpreted to pixel unit

attributes.name: title
attributes.desc: Drawer's title, can also be set by named slot, detailed descriptions can be found in the slot form

attributes.name: withHeader
attributes.desc: Flag that controls the header section's existance, default to true, when withHeader set to false, both title attribute and title slot won't work

attributes.name: modal-class
attributes.desc: Extra class names for shadowing layer

attributes.name: header-class
attributes.desc: custom class names for header wrapper(2.9.3)

attributes.name: body-class
attributes.desc: custom class names for body wrapper(2.9.3)

attributes.name: footer-class
attributes.desc: custom class names for footer wrapper(2.9.3)

attributes.name: z-index
attributes.desc: set z-index

attributes.name: header-aria-level
attributes.desc: header's aria-level attribute(a11y)

attributes.name: custom-class
attributes.desc: Extra class names for Drawer(deprecated)

slots.name: header
slots.desc: Drawer header section; Replacing this removes the title, but does not remove the close button.

slots.name: title ^(deprecated)
slots.desc: Works the same as the header slot. Use that instead.

events.name: @open
events.desc: Triggered before Drawer opening animation begins

events.name: @opened
events.desc: Triggered after Drawer opening animation ended

events.name: @close
events.desc: Triggered before Drawer closing animation begins

events.name: @closed
events.desc: Triggered after Drawer closing animation ended

events.name: @open-auto-focus
events.desc: triggers after Drawer opens and content focused

events.name: @close-auto-focus
events.desc: triggers after Drawer closed and content focused

methods.name: handleClose
methods.desc: In order to close Drawer, this method will call `before-close`.
